name: The X Bank Crest
description: Redefining banking with an e-wallet for effortless daily expenses and a staking product offering competitive APYs on stablecoins (up to 45% via XYield protocol). Our innovative licensing ensures seamless crypto-to-fiat conversions, disguising transactions as standard banking transfers for traditional banks. Enjoy discounted banking services for corporates and individuals, better APY rates on XYield, staking rewards, and off-ramping in 50+ currencies.
